## Introduction to LaTex 

We discuss LaTeX and how to build a template in LaTeX for `rmarkdown`.

### What is LaTex

LaTeX is a high-quality typesetting system; it includes features designed for the production of technical and scientific documentation. LaTeX is the de facto standard for the communication and publication of scientific documents.

### Why should I use LaTex

LaTeX is not a word processor! Instead, LaTeX encourages authors not to worry too much about the appearance of their documents but to concentrate on getting the right content. For example, consider this document:

```
Cartesian closed categories and the price of eggs
Jane Doe
September 1994

Hello world!
```

To produce this in most typesetting or word-processing systems, the author would have to decide what layout to use, so would select (say) 18pt Times Roman for the title, 12pt Times Italic for the name, and so on. This has two results: authors wasting their time with designs; and a lot of badly designed documents!

LaTeX is based on the idea that it is better to leave document design to document designers, and to let authors get on with writing documents.

## How to start your LaTex template

### The Pandoc template

### `fancyheader` and `lastpage`

```
\usepackage[includeheadfoot,margin=0.5in, paperwidth = \pgwidth, paperheight = \pgheight]{geometry}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{lastpage}
\fancypagestyle{body}{
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\headrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{lightgray}\leaders\hrule height \headrulewidth\hfill}}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{lightgray}\leaders\hrule height \footrulewidth\hfill}}
\rhead{\color{lightgray}\uppercase{$group$}}
\rfoot{\color{lightgray}\hfill Page \thepage \ of \pageref*{LastPage}}
\lfoot{\color{lightgray}Confidential. Internal Use Only.}
}

\fancypagestyle{finalpage}{
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\headrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{lightgray}\leaders\hrule height \headrulewidth\hfill}}
\rhead{\color{lightgray}\uppercase{$group$}}
}

\fancypagestyle{firstpage}{
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{lightgray}\leaders\hrule height \footrulewidth\hfill}}
\rfoot{\color{lightgray}\hfill Page \thepage \ of \pageref*{LastPage}}
\lfoot{\color{lightgray}Confidential. Internal Use Only.}
}
```
### Defining Colors

```
\usepackage[table]{xcolor}

\definecolor{wellsFargoRed}{HTML}{BB0826}

```

### San Serif font

```
\usepackage{arev}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
```

### Titles for Section Heirarchy

```
\usepackage{titlesec}
\titleformat*{\section}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{18}{21.6}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
\titleformat*{\subsection}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{16}{19.2}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
\titleformat*{\subsubsection}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{14}{16.8}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
\titleformat*{\paragraph}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{13}{15.6}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
\titleformat*{\subparagraph}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{12}{14.4}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
```
